医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
评估阿尔茨海默病抗淀粉样蛋白免疫疗法的关键问题阿尔茨海默病的抗淀粉样蛋白免疫疗法需要对其疗效、安全性和成本效益进行彻底评估。有关统计分析、治疗效果和病程改变的关键问题指导对这些药物的循证考虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Critical-questions-raised-for-evaluation-of-anti-amyloid-immunotherapies-in-Alzheimers-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Critical-questions-raised-for-evaluation-of-anti-amyloid-immunotherapies-in-Alzheimers-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2758bc35-3615-4644-b9ed-066beee45024 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 21:15:00 -0400 Critical questions raised for evaluation of anti-amyloid immunotherapies in Alzheimer's treatment
研究显示英国沿海城镇自闭症发病率上升，挑战性别刻板印象研究调查了过去二十年来贫困沿海社区自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 诊断的增加情况。它强调了时间趋势对诊断中性别差异的影响，以及需要进一步调查以了解潜在因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Study-reveals-rising-autism-rates-in-English-coastal-town-challenges-gender-stereotypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Study-reveals-rising-autism-rates-in-English-coastal-town-challenges-gender-stereotypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79ef7cb7-4e65-46c4-ba27-dfecbed24f08 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 21:07:00 -0400 Study reveals rising autism rates in English coastal town, challenges gender stereotypes
一种对所有年龄段都有效的新型 RSV 疫苗研究人员评估了呼吸道合胞病毒疫苗在老年和年轻大鼠中的体内功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/A-novel-RSV-vaccine-that-c​​ould-be- effective-across-all-ages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/A-novel-RSV-vaccine-that-c​​ould-be- effective-across-all-ages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=552a6b8c-3d49-4172-a89e-6fd372850e9c Tue, 04 Jul 2023 20:57:00 -0400 A novel RSV vaccine that could be effective across all ages
富含 Omega-3 的油可以防止农药对蜜蜂线粒体造成的损害新研究表明，使用富含 omega-3 的油（称为“ahiflower 油”）可以防止新烟碱类杀虫剂对蜜蜂线粒体造成的损害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Omega-3-rich-oil-can-prevent-damage-to-honey-bee-mitochondria-caused-by-pesticides.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Omega-3-rich-oil-can-prevent-damage-to-honey-bee-mitochondria-caused-by-pesticides.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f7d6508-cb54-4848-a937-d5fd54b42bcd Tue, 04 Jul 2023 11:18:00 -0400 Omega-3 rich oil can prevent damage to honey bee mitochondria caused by pesticides
全球减少传染病的努力必须包括年龄较大的儿童和青少年一项新的研究表明，在疾病负担转移到年龄较大的儿童和青少年身上后，全球降低传染病发病率的努力必须更加关注这一群体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Global-efforts-to-reduce-infectious-diseases-must-include-older-children-and-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Global-efforts-to-reduce-infectious-diseases-must-include-older-children-and-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb45f3f4-0f2f-4a4a-8a64-9a8f653b418f Tue, 04 Jul 2023 11:14:13 -0400 Global efforts to reduce infectious diseases must include older children and adolescents
LUMS 的全新应用程序旨在提高成人社会护理领域的创新兰卡斯特大学管理学院 (LUMS) 的学者们正在举办一场独特的活动，以纪念一款全新应用程序的正式发布，该应用程序旨在改善整个成人社会护理领域的创新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/LUMS-brand-new-app-aims-to-improve-innovation-across-the-adult-social-care-sector.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/LUMS-brand-new-app-aims-to-improve-innovation-across-the-adult-social-care-sector.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01150aff-c9b7-4959-8988-76788ac679f6 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 10:14:35 -0400 LUMS' brand-new app aims to improve innovation across the adult social care sector
试点性教育计划旨在挑战学校中有害的性行为和文化萨里大学和贝德福德郡大学设计了一项新的试点性教育计划，旨在帮助年轻人、家长和教师更好地讨论人际关系、性教育和色情内容。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Pilot-sex-education-program-aims-to-challenge-harmful- Sexized-behaviors-and-cultures-in-schools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Pilot-sex-education-program-aims-to-challenge-harmful- Sexized-behaviors-and-cultures-in-schools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfeba564-7242-473d-a6a6-9ffe3b1fc432 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 10:10:03 -0400
MHRA 的新企业计划制定了患者安全和获得创新医疗产品的目标今天（2023 年 7 月 4 日）发布了一项新的、富有远见的企业计划，阐述了药品和保健产品监管机构计划如何在未来三年内通过提供创新、安全和有效的医疗产品来确保患者安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/MHRAs-new-corporate-plan-sets-out-goals-for-patent-safety-and-access-to-innovative-medical-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/MHRAs-new-corporate-plan-sets-out-goals-for-patent-safety-and-access-to-innovative-medical-products.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3a72410-fba3-47a4-bf02-a5cce646c862 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 09:57:35 -0400 MHRA's new corporate plan sets out goals for patient safety and access to innovative medical products
EPFL 科学家开发出一种重建 Tau 原纤维的创新方法EPFL 科学家开发了 ClearTau，这是一种创新方法和平台，用于重建阿尔茨海默病和其他神经退行性疾病中发现的 Tau 蛋白聚集体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/EPFL-scientists-develop-an-innovative-method-for-reconstructing-Tau-fibrils.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/EPFL-scientists-develop-an-innovative-method-for-reconstructing-Tau-fibrils.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=487d3a55-87ca-44eb-9d01-12b90c865014 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 09:52:00 -0400 EPFL scientists develop an innovative method for reconstructing Tau fibrils
确定了重度抑郁症的新生物标志物从外观上看，人类大脑的最外层称为皮质，是一个由组织褶皱组成的迷宫。这些褶皱的顶部或凸起表面（称为回旋）在大脑的正常运作中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/New-biomarker-for-major-depressive-disorder-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/New-biomarker-for-major-depressive-disorder-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da59982d-155d-4efa-86ef-123a6e1b1cb9 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 09:47:09 -0400 New biomarker for major depressive disorder identified
